intro: Mespilodaphne opifera, commonly known as the sweetgum or Chinese sweetgum, is a deciduous tree native to eastern Asia. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant autumn foliage and unique fruit structure. Mespilodaphne opifera is also valued in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
